markdown: **Activate** <actions string="" /> 10 minutes (Investigate);     **Effect** You gain a +2 item bonus to skill checks to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about [Nhimbaloth](/Deities.aspx?ID=163), her faith, or creatures associated with her (such as [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160), [vampiric mists](/Monsters.aspx?ID=845), [wisps](/Monsters.aspx?ID=414), and other incorporeal creatures associated with death). Each time you use this ability after the first in a 24-hour period, you are exposed to the Empty Death.
